sourcesContent:
<template>
    <apexChart type="line" height="300"  :options="chartOptions" :series="series"></apexChart>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name:"SplineChart",
  props:['data'],
    data: function() {
      return {
        chartOptions: {
          chart: {
            id: 'line_chart',
          },
          xaxis: {
            categories: this.data.map(item=>item.map(i=>i._id)),
          },
          title: {
          text: "Doanh thu" + this.data.map(item=>item.year),
          align: "center", 
          margin: 20, 
          style: {
            fontSize: "18px", 
            fontWeight: "bold", 
            color: "#333", 
          },
        },
          
        },
        series: [{
          name: 'series-1',
          data: this.data.filter(item=>item.map(i=>i.totalRevenue)),
          
        }],
        
      }
    },
  }
</script>
